text:
Asahi? What's wrong?
Did something happen during rehearsal?
Hmm... I wonder if it's because of this costume.

...Don't you feel comfortable in your
matching outfit with everyone else?
It's not that it doesn't suit me, but...

...Everyone looked so pure white and fluffy,
moving around like they were on clouds.

Then, during the performance, I want everyone,
including the fans, to ride on those clouds.
